## Carry Recipe
_Hip Cross Carry – Base Size Minus 3 – 2 Cross Passes_

- Middle marker on shoulder with wrap draped diagonally around back
- Cross tails at hip, continue around waist, and tie at opposite hip
- Slide baby into crosses and spread the passes
- Tighten and retie as needed
